test:watch: run all unit tests, in watch mode
test:integration:watch: run all integration tests, in watch mode
start:watch: start API on 3001, in watch mode
db:restart: rebuild and start PostgreSQL docker containers
db:migrate-status: check the status of PostgreSQL migrations locally (using .env)
db:migrate:staging: run PostgreSQL migrations on AWS staging (using .env.staging)
db:migrate:rollback:staging: rollback previous PostgreSQL migrations on AWS staging (using .env.staging)
db:migrate:reset:staging: reset all PostgreSQL migrations on AWS staging (using .env.dev)
